attributes.action: DE/KA Snelgrove. To treat the Gurkas in the same manner as other imigrants from other non ec contries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Dear Sir, we think it as a grave injustis to not allow all Gurkas who have served the UK IN THE WAY THEY HAVED,PUTING THEIR LIVES AT RISK AND THEN TO BE TREATED AS SECOND CLASS CITIZENS,WHERAS OTHERS FROM NON EU COUNTRIES CAN COME TO LIVE IN THE UK ALLMOST AT WILL. THIS SITUATION MUST BE CHANGED IF NOT WE THINK YOU WLL LOOSE MANY VOTES AT THE NEXT ELECTION

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
